 2016-03922016-05-20,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
National Energy Board Act Part VI (Oil and Gas) Regulations
SubjectIssuance of Licences GL-315 and GL-316 - Bear Head LNG Corporation
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE OF LICENCES (1) GL-315 to Bear Head LNG Corporation to export gas, in the form of liquefied natural gas, from a point at a point at the outlet of the loading arm of the natural gas liquefaction facility located in Richmond County near Point Tupper, Nova Scotia; and (2) GL-316 to Bear Head LNG Corporation (Bear Head LNG) to import natural gas, at the point where the Maritimes & Northeast Pipeline crosses the Canada-United States border near St. Stephen, New Brunswick, or such other point as the Board may approve.
AttachmentsAttachment
